https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rWJ4nYmT1AH5Lad61m05lQi3oea.jpg Walter Lee, aka Vivien, provides voice over for this short documentary. Stills, vintage footage, and re-enactments paint an amazingly vivid backdrop to exhibit the life of a "squishy" drag queen through wartime service and 1950s repression. About Vivien
